remarks: The zero function is the only function that sums to zero in a direct product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 14-Jul-2019.)
statement:
eldprdi.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
eldprdi.w $e |- W = { h e. X_ i e. I ( S ` i ) | h finSupp .0. } $.
eldprdi.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
eldprdi.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
eldprdi.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. W ) $.
dprdfeq0 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( G gsum F ) = .0. <-> F = ( x e. I |-> .0. ) ) ) $.
$d .0. h x $.
$d F h x $.
$d G h i x $.
$d I h i x $.
$d S h i x $.
$d ph x $.
